parameters.name: ViewName
parameters.description: Name of the drawing view to which you want to copy or move the selected model dimension

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X location in sheet space for the newly copied or moved dimension

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y location in sheet space for the newly copied or moved dimension

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z location in sheet space for the newly copied or moved dimension; set to 0

title: IDrawingDoc.DragModelDimension
description: Copies or moves dimensions to a different drawing view.
signature:
void DragModelDimension( 
   System.String
ViewName
,
   System.Int16
DropEffect
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: ViewName
parameters.description: Name of the drawing view to which you want to copy or move the selected model dimension

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X location in sheet space for the newly copied or moved dimension

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y location in sheet space for the newly copied or moved dimension

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z location in sheet space for the newly copied or moved dimension; set to 0

returns: The ViewName argument cannot be the current view for the dimension.
